type.description: The type of the event, always `response.custom_tool_call.input.done`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was updated.

item_id.description: The ID of the tool call item that was updated.

input.description: The final input string that was emitted.

title: Response custom tool call input done event
description: A streaming event that indicated custom tool call input was completed.
